title: PROTECTION PROHIBITED
fullText:
Overtemperature protection shall not be provided in either of the following circumstances:
(a)	In accordance with Clause 7.2.9, protection shall not be provided for motors associated with a fire-protection service.
(b)	Protection shall not be provided where the opening of the motor circuit could create a hazard.
Overtemperature protection need not be provided for unattended submersible pump motors immersed in water that have a rating not greater than 2250 W.
